# Allowed test-related package names for supply chain security check
# These packages are known to be legitimate despite containing "test" in their name
# One package per line, comments start with #

pytest
pytest-cov
pytest-asyncio
pytest-timeout
testcontainers
pytest-mock
pytest-env
pytest-xdist
pytest-benchmark
pytest-html
pytest-sugar
pytest-parallel
hypothesis
unittest-xml-reporting
